title: Yo can anyone else log on?
body:
I cant log into League it just says Connection Failure: Unable to connect to PVP.net server
Edit -  My Mate Logged on, is redownloading a smart idea right now?

replies.body:
Hey Chime King Gumbo,

Please follow the steps on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and see if that helps. You might also try using a VPN; I suggest [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/). Let me know if anything helps.

-DTN
